item.title: mac 终端
item.description: iTerm 安装终端 brew install --cask iterm2 安装 oh my zsh sh -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/master/tools/install.sh)" 安装插件 zsh-autosuggestions git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions ${ZSH_CUSTOM:-~/.oh-my-zsh/custom}/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions 添加插件到配制文件 ‘.zshrc’ source ~/.zsh/zsh-autosuggestions/zsh-autosuggestions.zsh 美化终端：Powerlevel10k 安装：Powerlevel10k git clone --depth=1 https://github.com/romkatv/powerlevel10k.git ${ZSH_CUSTOM:-$HOME/.oh-my-zsh/custom}/themes/powerlevel10k 在配制文件.zshrc中设置 ZSH_THEME="powerlevel10k/powerlevel10k"
